data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Catalano, María Inés, Paradell, Susana, Dietrich, Christopher H. (2013): Three new species of Neozygina Dietrich & Dmitriev (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Typhlocybinae) from Argentina, with a key to South American species. Zootaxa 3652 (1): 156-162, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3652.1.5
